title: Baharat salmon cakes with aioli
ingredients: ['450g salmon fillets, divided', '35g soft white breadcrumbs', '1 egg white', '2 tablespoons chopped spring onions', '2 tablespoons chopped roasted red pepper', '1 tablespoon chopped flat leaf parsley', '1 3/4 teaspoons baharat (Middle Eastern spice mix), divided', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'Aioli', '4 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', 'cracked black pepper to taste']
